product_name: Point 65 Apollo Sit-On-Top Kayak - Stern Section
long_description: The Point 65 Apollo sit-on-top kayak stern section combines with the Apollo bow section to form a single kayak, and both sections combine with the Apollo center section to form a tandem kayak.
short_description: The Point 65 Apollo sit-on-top kayak stern section combines with the Apollo bow section to form a single kayak, and both sections combine with the Apollo center section to form a tandem kayak.
